snippet: When making the most out of fresh asparagus, don’t neglect your soup pot.
abstract: Melissa Clark A Good Appetite column offers a recipe for asparagus soup with ricotta crostini.
lead_paragraph: When making the most out of fresh asparagus, don’t neglect your soup pot.

headline.main: A Spoonful of Spring Asparagus, Green as Can Be
headline.print_headline: A Spoonful of Spring, Green as Can Be
